{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:54.639

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:58.239
    | text      = or the Eurasian Chess Board, as Brzezinski calls it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:02.239
    | text      = It's argued that U.S. influence in Eurasia is exceedingly important to world stability
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:07.119
    | text      = Possibly more to the point and more realistically, holding the most sway in that region is critically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:11.840
    | text      = important to U.S. strategic interests and the prospect of a hostile country having more sway
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:19.280
    | text      = Sure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:19.840
    | text      = The text envisions Eurasia is split into four segments on a board
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:23.760
    | text      = There's the West, which includes most of Europe,

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = where the U.S. is said to have a foothold on the chess board
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:29.360
    | text      = There's the East, which is basically China, Japan, North and South Korea, as well as Southeast Asia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:34.559
    | text      = There's the Middle Space, which is the former USSR
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:37.599
    | text      = And then there's the South, which is mostly the Middle East
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:40.960

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
